title: King prawns, egg and Chinese chive water dumplings
description: Dumplings don't need to be a drama - the dough is as easy as can be and the filling can be tweaked to your liking.
ingredients: 200g/7oz king prawns, 2/3 roughly chopped and 1/3 finely chopped
2 free-range eggs, lightly beaten with ½ tsp salt
20g/1oz Chinese chives (also known as garlic chives)
1 tbsp of Shaoxing wine (or substitute dry sherry or rice vinegar)
